review_data.title: Sehr lecker und preiswert!
review_data.content: Empfehlenswert! Sehr lecker und preiswert es gibt immer ein Vegetarisches und ein Fleischmenue pro Tag und einen Wochenhit.

review_data.title: Lunch during seminar
review_data.content: We had lunch at this place because our team also had a seminar at the same location. The food very good, 3 different dishes and a salad bar were available (meat, fish and veggi). The prices were reasonable to good looking at the quality of...More

review_data.title: A complete, delicious meal for under 19CHF!
